Governor Jared Polis
August 16 at 10:06 AM ·

👨‍👧‍👦 Parents: Is your child experiencing COVID-19 related stress?

Here are some ways the CDC recommends supporting them:
💬 Talk with your child about COVID-19 and share facts in a way that they can understand.
💕 Let them know it is okay to feel upset. Share how you deal with your own stress.
🗞 Limit exposure to pandemic news, including social media. Children may misinterpret what they hear and become frightened.
🖍 Try to keep up with regular routines and create a fun schedule of activities.
🦸 Be a role model. Take breaks, get plenty of sleep, exercise, and eat well.
💻 Connect with your friends and family members.
📚 Spend time with your child in meaningful activities such as reading together, exercising, playing board games.

➡️ Visit the CDC’s website for more ways to cope: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/daily-life-coping/for-parents.html

However, please note that this is not an organized parade down Lincoln Avenue. Chief Christensen adds, "We are excited to support the celebration of our graduating seniors. We have brought in several officers on overtime so that the seniors can celebrate safely on the route that we have secured for them."

Please follow all social distancing recommendations and county guidelines while lining the street.

Mars will be nearly 168 million miles from Earth at the time, compared to the moon’s distance of only 240,000 miles. Even though Mars is considerably larger than the moon, it will appear much, much smaller, far off in the distance.
